name: The Defiant - DeFi, Web3 & NFT Insights
title: Arthur Hayes on Global Economic Turmoil, Crypto Sovereignty, and the Future of Capital
text:
Synopsis
Arthur Hayes predicts a potential short-term crypto market correction driven by rising US Treasury yields, while maintaining a long-term bullish outlook on Bitcoin and suggesting investors prioritize capital preservation through strategic asset allocation.

Key Insights
- Hayes forecasts Bitcoin could temporarily trade between $70-80,000 during a potential mini financial crisis triggered by US 10-year Treasury yields exceeding 5%
- Long-term Bitcoin price target set at $250,000 by end of 2025
- Expects potential market volatility due to rising interest rates and potential financial system disruptions
- Recommends reducing leverage and focusing on capital preservation
- Suggests moving capital into cryptocurrencies and decentralized finance as a hedge against national currency debasement
- Predicts European economic challenges due to high energy costs and restricted capital mobility
- Skeptical about potential crypto-friendly policies under a potential Trump presidency, warning of likely regulatory compromises
- Sees blockchain as a tool for democratizing capital formation, particularly in scientific research and emerging technologies
- Believes AI will naturally interact with blockchain technologies as a native financial substrate
- Highlighted Aptos and Athena as promising blockchain projects in his investment portfolio
